description.value:
Canister large enough for a single Heavy Weapon + Bipod/Tripod and ammo, or a comparable amount of equipment. Equipped with Grav-chute and can be delivered by dropping it from an Aircraft. Requires +10 Operate(Aeronautica) or +0 Intelligence Test. If test failed, canister drop scatters DoFx10m away.

Effect: Rare

Notes: -
